channel.title: Missing right click options
channel.description: I was just signing out of WoW and when i tried running it again there was no open option in the right click menu and double clicking didn't work. No file on my computer just has a right click "Open" option anymore, They still have open with, so i tried that and I selected always open with this... but it didn't fix it.... I ran a few registry tweaks and they made it so the fiels run when double clicked but there is still no open option, and only exe's run when double clicked.

item.title: Missing right click options
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

My pc is working again, still no right click option lol, would reinstall windows but my external fried too -.-’… well yea, my ubuntu install also fried, god damn whats going on… lol everything is fucking up.

Well yea, I thought it was a registry problem also but it looks to me like all the keys are there and still good, I tried applying a few I found via google but still nothing. The main option for every single file on my pc is Open in Notepad++ lol, ever open a movie in notepad?

Read full topic

item.title: Missing right click options
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

It’s definitely something to do with the registry. Nothing to do with renaming folders

I would either reinstall windows or just keep on google-ing until i find something relevant.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing right click options
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

I am not stupid lol, i tried to restart and restore, and i didnt rename a folder, that would not remove the right click option to open anything, even pics or, well everything is missing the option, doesn’t matter so much because my pc is fried right now…

Read full topic

item.title: Missing right click options
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

Or maybe you have re-named the program files folder and they are broken shortcuts?

Read full topic

item.title: Missing right click options

item.description:
@diamond1 wrote:

restart your computer, its happened to me before.

Read full topic
